state: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to try to take a trip west. With that accomplished, head south. Okay, and then, take a trip west. Then, take a trip west. And then, make an attempt to head north. And then, head east. With that over with, retrieve the TextWorld style passkey from the floor of the workshop. Then, try to go south. With that accomplished, unlock the TextWorld style gate inside the sauna with the TextWorld style passkey. After unlocking the TextWorld style gate, ensure that the TextWorld style gate is open. After that, make an attempt to take a trip south. After that, attempt to go south. That done, move south. And then, pick-up the key from the floor of the canteen. Got that? Good! -= Chamber =- You arrive in a chamber. An usual one. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great. There is an unblocked exit to the west. > -= Chamber =-0/1
next_state: -= Salon =- Of every salon you could have walked into, you had to come round an ordinary one. You can see an opened dresser nearby. Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?
